cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→ c2 ⊆ c4)

comment: A closed projective subspace is a set of atoms. (Contributed by NM, 25-Jan-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
